title: Police Probe Shooting Of La Marque Baby
content:
On March 5th at approximately 5:56 PM, Officers with the La Marque Police Department responded to 2222 Cedar Drive in reference to a 17 month female that had been shot.
The initial investigation has shown that the child had been shot once in the abdomen. The child was subsequently transported to an area hospital for her injuries. At the time of this release the child remains in critical condition.
According to the parents they were the only ones present when the child was shot. The details surrounding the events leading up to the child being shot remain under investigation. Based on initial interviews that have been conducted it is still unclear as to what transpired in the home of 2222 Cedar.
The La Marque Police Department is urging anyone with information pertaining to this case to make contact. Contact can be made with Detective Arredondo at (409) 938-9250. Contact can also be made with the La Marque Crime Stoppers (409) 938-8477 (TIPS).
